title: 3 Lessons of Productivity
description: Today's episode is brought to you by Linode. Linode   Provides superfast SSD based Linux servers in the cloud starting at  $5 a month. Linode  is offering Developer Tea listeners $20 worth of credit if you use the code DEVELOPERTEA2017  at checkout. Head over to spec.fm/linode to learn more about what Linode has to offer to Developer Tea listeners .
